title: SECTION A. DEFINITIONS
sample_text:
1. 
Standard Definitions 
Def. 1. 
Accident or Accidental means a sudden, unforeseen and involuntary event caused by external, 
visible and violent means. 
Def. 2. 
Any one illness means continuous period of Illness and includes relapse within 45 days from the 
date of last consultation with the Hospital/Nursing Home where treatment was taken. 
Def. 3.

title: AYUSH Hospital is a healthcare facility wherein medical/surgical/para-surgical treatment
sample_text:

b. eaching hospital attached to AYUSH College recognized by the Central Government /Central 
Council of Indian Medicine/Central Council for Homeopathy; or 
c.

title: AYUSH Hospital, standalone or co-located within-patient healthcare facility of any recognized
AYUSH Day Care Centre means and includes Community Health Centre (CHC), Primary Health

local authorities, wherever applicable and having facilities for carrying out treatment procedures
